Log a user in.description: Making a POST request to this address attempts to log a user in. If login was completed successfully, a cookie with the name PHPSESSID is sent back. Otherwise, information on why the login failed is sent back.

Malformed request type.description: A request type other than POST was made. Due to transport of passwords, only POST requests are allowed.

Bad username.description: A username was entered that did not exist on the system

Bad password.description: The password given did not match the hash stored on the system

Username and password correct.description: Both a correct username and a correct password were specified.

Log a user out.description: Making a POST request logs the user out. Making any other type of request does nothing.

Method other than POST.description: A method other than POST was made.

Create an account.description: Register a new account on the system.

params.username: The username of the account to create.
params.password: The password of the account to create.

Method other than POST.description: A method other than POST was made.

Check if user is logged in.description: Returns a boolean containing whether or not the user is logged in with a valid username.

User is not logged in.description: The user is not logged in.

User is logged in, but username does not.description: Hrmmm. That is a bit weird. Maybe the account was deleted?

User is logged in, and username exists.description: The user is logged in with a valid username.

Parse Markdown.description: This service parses Markdown just as it does with posts.

Parsed successfully.description: Text was included and parsed successfully.
